DescriptionData.Title: Wolfe F/X 6 Color Palette - Monster
DescriptionData.Description:
Wolfe F/X Monster Palette includes 6 Hydrocolor Essential colors for creating your Monster design today. Wolfe Hydrocolor Makeup is water-activated and easy to work with. Their intense pigmentation renders maximum color and their wax base enables flexing with movements instead of cracking.
Wolfe Hydrocolor makeup is easy to apply, dries fast and removes quickly. Includes colors: Charcoal, Blood, Raw Sienna, Orc, Blithe and Bruise. Each color is in 5 g (.18 oz) square.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Each 6 color Wolfe F/X Monster Face Paint Palette is good for 50-200 applications
Ideal for long sessions, such as photo shoots and competitions
Wolfe Hydrocolor Makeup is water-activated and easy to work with
Their intense pigmentation renders maximum color and their wax base enables flexing with movements instead of cracking
Includes colors: Charcoal, Blood, Raw Sienna, Orc, Blithe and Bruise
